page.title: 19HEALTH
page.content: When people are ill in this area they have to go to{NORTH WALSHHAM,AYLSHAM, {or ALDBOROUGH} Doctor.Most children go to {NORTH WALSHHAM }Health centre.There is nealy always somebody off of school because they are ill. At {NORTH WALSHAM COTTAGE HOSPITAL there is a{MATERNITY UNIT,}which is threatened with closure,and women would have to go to the Norfolk and Norwich Hospital where the facilities are much better although North Walsham is much smaller and some say cosier. At the North Walsham Health Centre clinics are run for all areas of health care. There are 8 or 9 doctors,practice nurses,Health Visitors,Midwives and 2 dispensaries. Soon new surgeries are being built as the Health Centre is not big enough.
